Continually sample the distortion: Alt-drag in preview with Reconstruct tool, Displace, Amplitwist, or Affine mode selected
Option-drag in preview with reconstruct tool, Displace, Amplitwist, or Affine mode selected
Decrease/increase brush size by 2, or de: Down Arrow/Up Arrow in Brush Size, Density, Pressure, Rate, or Turbulent Jitter text box
Down Arrow/Up Arrow in Brush Size, Density, Pressure, Rate, or Turbulent Jittertext box

Select multiple points in Curves panel: Click the first point; Shift-click additional points
Click the first point; Shift-click additional points
Display highlights that will be clipped: Alt-drag Exposure, Recovery, or Black sliders
Option-drag Exposure, Recovery, or Black sliders

To delete a point on the curve: Select a point and press Delete
Select a point and press Delete.

Move selection area 1 pixel: Any selection + Right Arrow, Left Arrow, Up Arrow, or Down Arrow
Any selection + Right Arrow, Left Arrow, Up Arrow, or Down Arrow
Move selection 1 pixel: Move tool + Right Arrow, Left Arrow, Up Arrow, or Down Arrow
Move tool + Right Arrow, Left Arrow, Up Arrow, or Down Arrow
Move layer 1 pixel when nothing selected: Control + Right Arrow, Left Arrow, Up Arrow, or Down Arrow
Command + Right Arrow, Left Arrow, Up Arrow, or Down Arrow

Duplicate a path: Pen , Path Selection or Direct Selection tool + Control + Alt-drag
Pen , Path Selection or Direct Selection tool+ Command + Option-drag

Select foreground color from color picke: Any painting tool + Shift + Alt + right-click and drag
Any painting tool + Control + Option + Command and drag
Select foreground color from image with: Any painting tool + Alt or any shape tool + Alt
Any painting tool + Option or any shape tool + Option
Sets opacity, tolerance, strength, or ex: Any painting or editing tool + number keys
Any painting or editing tool + number keys
Sets flow for painting mode: Any painting or editing tool + Shift + number keys
Any painting or editing tool + Shift + number keys

Dodge/burn shadows: Dodge tool/Burn tool + Shift + Alt + S
Dodge tool/Burn tool + Shift + Option + S
Dodge/burn midtones: Dodge tool/Burn tool + Shift + Alt + M
Dodge tool/Burn tool + Shift + Option + M
Dodge/burn highlights: Dodge tool/Burn tool + Shift + Alt + H
Dodge tool/Burn tool + Shift + Option + H

Move type in image: Control-drag type when Type layer is selected
Command-drag type when Type layer is selected
Select 1 character left/right or 1 line: Shift + Left Arrow/Right Arrow or Down Arrow/Up Arrow, or Control + Shift + Left Arrow/Right Arrow
Shift + Left Arrow/Right Arrow or Down Arrow/Up Arrow, or Command + Shift + Left Arrow/Right Arrow
Move 1 character left/right, 1 line down: Left Arrow/Right Arrow, Down Arrow/Up Arrow, or Control + Left Arrow/Right Arrow
Left Arrow/Right Arrow, Down Arrow/Up Arrow, or Command + Left Arrow/Right Arrow

Align left, center, or right: Horizontal Type tool + Control + Shift + L, C, or R
Horizontal Type tool + Command + Shift + L, C, or R
Align top, center, or bottom: Vertical Type tool + Control + Shift + L, C, or R
Vertical Type tool + Command + Shift + L, C, or R
Decrease or increase leading 2 points or: Alt + Down Arrow or Up Arrow
Option + Down Arrow or Up Arrow
Decrease or increase baseline shift 2 po: Shift + Alt + Down Arrow or Up Arrow
Shift + Option + Down Arrow or Up Arrow
Decrease or increase kerning/tracking 20: Alt + Left Arrow or Right Arrow
Option + Left Arrow or Right Arrow

Turn command on and all others off, or t: Alt-click the check mark next to a command.
Option-click the check mark next to a command.
Change action or action set options: Alt + double-click action or action set
Option + double-click action or action set

Paste using previous settings without di: Alt + Paste Frames command from the Panel pop‑up menu
Option + Paste Frames command from the Panel pop‑up menu

Switch between timecode and frame number: Alt + click the current-time display in the upper-left corner of the timeline.
Option + click the current-time display in the upper-left corner of the timeline.
Jump to the next/previous whole second i: Hold down the Shift key when clicking the Next/Previous Frame buttons .
Hold down the Shift key when clicking the Next/Previous Frame buttons
Increase playback speed: Hold down the Shift key while dragging the current time.
Hold down the Shift key while dragging the current time.
Decrease playback speed: Hold down the Control key while dragging the current time.
Hold down the Command key while dragging the current time.
Back ten frames: Shift + Left Arrow or Shift + Page Up
Shift + Left Arrow or Shift Page Up
Forward ten frames: Shift + Right Arrow or Shift + Page Down
Shift + Right Arrow or Shift + Page Down

Change brush size: Alt + right click + drag left or right
Ctrl + Option + drag left or right
Decrease/increase brush softness/hardnes: Alt + right click + drag up or down
Ctrl + Option + drag up or down
Display precise cross hair for brushes: Caps Lock or Shift + Caps Lock

Load channel as selection: Control-click channel thumbnail, or Alt + Ctrl + 3 , 4 , 5
Command-click channel thumbnail, or Option + Command + 3 , 4 , 5
Set options for Save Selection As Channe: Alt-click Save Selection As Channel button
Option-click Save Selection As Channel button
Display channel options: Double-click alpha or spot channel thumbnail
Double-click alpha or spot channel thumbnail

Merge layers: Highlight layers you want to merge, then Control + E
Highlight the layers you want to merge, then Command + E
Copy current layer to layer below: Alt + Merge Down command from the Panel pop‑up menu
Option + Merge Down command from the Panel pop‑up menu
Merge all visible layers to a new layer: Alt + Merge Visible command from the Panel pop‑up menu
Option + Merge Visible command from the Panel pop‑up menu
Create a clipping mask: Alt-click the line dividing two layers
Option-click the line dividing two layers
Create vector mask that hides all or dis: Control + Alt-click Add Layer Mask button
Command + Option-click Add Layer Mask button
Display layer group properties: Right-click layer group and choose Group Properties, or double-click group
Control-click the layer group and choose Group Properties, or double-click group

Create new layer comp without the New La: Alt-click Create New Layer Comp button
Option-click Create New Layer Comp button

Create new swatch from foreground color: Click in empty area of panel
Click in empty area of panel
